Title: Product increase
Review: I love this product however, the price has increased tremendously during a crisis. It went from 16.00 to 22.00 shame on you Uncle Funky's daughter!!

Title: LIES TO CURLY HAIRED GIRLS!
Review:
Video Player is loading.Play VideoPlayMuteCurrent Time 0:00/Duration 0:15Loaded: 80.25%0:00Stream Type LIVESeek to live, currently behind liveLIVERemaining Time -0:15 1xPlayback RateChaptersChaptersDescriptionsdescriptions off, selectedCaptionsCaptions off, selectedAudio TrackFullscreenThis is a modal window.



   I am disappointed in this product. I wanted to love Uncle Funkys but just couldn’t due to their lies about the ingredients.If you have curly hair like me, you are always trying to find silicone and sulfate free conditioner. However, even through the bottle says free of silicone and sulfates, they are LYING because they have AMIDIMITHICONE AND BEHNTRIMONIUM METHOSULFATE! How is a supposed “hydrating conditioner” going to moisturize and keep your hair hydrated with ingredients that keep out moisture.So disappointed and disgusted with this brand and product. Never again will I buy.

Title: love this
Review: I love the moisture I get makes my hair feel very soft. I also love because of the natural ingredients. I have 4b 4c hair

Title: Amazzzzzing product! Great job to the developer of this product. Thank you!
Review: I love this product! I have really damaged hair from the water we use here deployed in Afghanistan. This conditioner smells soo great! I love this product line. Especially the curl stimulator with the butter cream.

Title: Impressed!
Review: Really love this product so far. It’s been about a month since ordering. It’s a very thick conditioner, which I need because I have very wild, tangly long hair. It doesn’t weigh it down from what I’ve noticed either. I used to use wayyy more expensive conditioner but I don’t think I would ever switch back. Highly recommend for people with long wavy/curly thick hair.

Title: Leaves hair soft and detangled
Review: Using the richer rich moisturizer us very good, it conditions well ,softness, don't have to use alot, let sit 15-30 minutes rinse leaves hair very soft and smells great.

Title: Hydrating Conidtioner
Review: This has many different uses- detangler, co-wash, deep conditioner etc. It is very moisturizing and gets the job done. A natural product on the market.

Title: Great Slip for Naturally Kinky/Coily Hair
Review: It can be used as a deep conditioner and it's very moisturizing. It does help detangle coily, kinky textures.

Title: Uncle Funky's Conditioner
Review: Did not truly deliver as advertised. Not a great bargain; pricey for the small size (only 8 oz.)

Title: Tangled my hair
Review: I found this product tangled my 4b hair in the shower.

Title: It's awesome! Definitely try it!
Review: I like the creamy richness of the conditioner. It smells wonderful and softens the hair! I love it!

Title: Worth Every Penny
Review: The slip in this product is AMAZING! I wish it was sold in a larger bottle.

Title: It’s curl defining
Review: It makes my hair really soft

Title: Great product
Review: Makes my hair so soft!

Title: Great moisturizer
Review: Great moisturizer

Title: Love it
Review: Excellent

Title: Five Stars
Review: My absolute favorite conditioner and it smells delicious!

Title: I'm going to used this for the first time hope ...
Review: I'm going to used  this  for the first time hope it growth my hair

Title: Great for curly hair!!
Review: I have a wavy, curly mix, and like to use sulfate and silicone free products, but have issues with my scalp becoming irritated, dry, and flaky, as well as having my hair break and losing hair. These products work GREAT! So far, my scalp feels wonderful, and my hair isn't dry. My curl is revived, and I feel good about my hair again!!

Title: Love This BUT....
Review: This is an amazing product but won't purchase again due to the shipping costs.

Title: Eh not the conditioner for thick hair
Review: Given that I have a product from this brand I figured to give the conditioner a try and it was horrible it’s soft and smells great but did nothing for my hair, I have thick hair so I always need a reliable conditioner, this was not it

Title: Good
Review: Great quality product. My wife uses it all the time

Title: I love it!
Review: Provides the most slip ever. I love it!

Title: Five Stars
Review: Very good conditioner

Title: Don't buy it!
Review: This conditioner is packed with silicones!!! Specifically amodimethicone and dimethicone. Everything with a blue-green label from Uncle's Funky's Daughter is a no-no. Anyone with low porosity hair should stay away from their products all together. You're welcome.

Title: Great curly hair conditioner
Review: Love this product

Title: It’s a good product!
Review: Conditioner made my hair feel soft and moisturized.

Title: Wow
Review: I recently dyed my hair blonde- and of course it's a mission to keep it moisturized. I have been going through different hair mask's to see what works for the week, since with curly hair AND bleached you should wash less frequently. I had to replace my Devacurl melt into moisture because it was causing issues with my scalp, not moisturizing for the whole week and my curls were weighed down. THIS is amazing. My scalp feels great, my curls FELT moisturized, and it really did heal up some damage from my last touch up. It smells like mint, I left it on for 30mins as advised, and my hair just felt stronger and LOOKED moisturized even while wet (no frizz). My ONLY issue, is that it's very small for what you pay- but other than that, worth a try. This company in general, when you use their products you can just feel your hair respond to it immediately. Highly recommended for damaged curls!

Title: Great Hair Moisturizer!
Review: Hands down THE best conditioner or mask I've ever used. I have 2B/3C curly low porosity hair that tends to be dry and frizzy. I live in Wyoming with a very dry climate and have been using this wonderful smelling mask as a conditioner (apply after shampooing and leave on for about 5-7 minuted before rinsing) once or twice a week. Followed up with UFD curly magic and I get beautiful soft shiny curls. LOVE the fruity/minty non-perfumy smell. Thanks UFD!!!

Title: Not worth it
Review: Ok product, it’s very thick but not worth the money  I have shoulder length hair and could only get about three uses out of it and that’s definitely not worth it for the price.

Title: But for the price....
Review: I am a fan of Uncle Funky’s Daughter products and my overall favorite is the Heal & Renew mask. From over coloring, over heating and stress my hair was badly damaged. I began steaming my hair with one product, saw a difference but wasn’t truly satisfied. I tried the UFD’s Renew & Heal and my hair feel in love. My hair was soft, manageable and I had little breakage. I need to buy more but $22.00? Hey, sometimes you have to pay more for quality.

Title: I live in the tropics with curly/ frizzy hair.
Review: Love love love. Now all I have is curly hair with no frizz!

Title: Spilled all over the box!
Review: I just received this item,  the jar lid was open and there was only about half of the product in the container. the rest was spilled all over the box! this is a very pricy product to receive it open and spilled. whay can I do?

Title: Waste of money
Review: Reviews said it was good for bleached frizzy hair, but it did nothing for me. Waste of money.

Title: Literally magical
Review: Wow! I was not expecting the smell and moisture this product brought to my hair. I wish the container was larger for the price because I do have thick hair (3c/4a curl type) and it’s a lot. But a little can go a long way. Will be purchasing again. Feels great on my scalp too, like a refreshing feeling.

Title: All their products are a must for curls!
Review: The smell of this stuff!! Amazing! Feels minty and fresh! Leaves your hair soft, silky and shiny!

Title: Not a fave as a conditioner, but it smells nice!
Review: This hair mask was okay. It smells nice, but it’s a bit watery. Admittedly, I’ve only used it once. In my opinion, Shea moisture products found at my local CVS did a better job conditioning my curls and coils.

Title: This product was recommended off of a you tube channel and it was a good recommendation.
Review: This product is great. Little costly for the size but all in all a very good hair mask.

Title: Love
Review: Love

Title: Tiny Jar
Review: It's really good; however, it doesn't last long if you have thick hair (1-2 uses).

Title: This product makes my hair very soft and shiny
Review: I love the smell of this product I used it for deep conditioning

Title: My package arriving in good condition
Review: My package came in excellent condition Thankyou

Title: Moisturizing Hair Masque
Review: This masque is awesome! It's a challenge for me to find deep conditioners that don't contain a lot of junk ingredients --- Heal & Renew is perfection. It has a peppermint/lightly perfumed scent. Most of the ingredients are film forming humectants including a little bit of silk protein, which is excellent for highly porous/color treated hair. You don't need to be heavy-handed with this. A little bit goes a long way, which usually isn't the case with a masque. This is a keeper.

Title: A balanced conditioner
Review: I like this conditioner but it pentrates and my hair does feel as moisturized as so other deep conditioners. It is more difficult to detangle hair.  I allow it to sit on hair before detangling but my hair soaks it up so much do that there is no slip.

Title: Overpriced
Review: Insanely small for the price I like their products but not worth it.

Title: Horrible. No penetration, just sits on your hair.
Review: The only great thing about this product is the smell if you like peppermint, which I do not. Contains glycerin as one of the first 3 ingredients, which is never good for low porosity hair. Buy Kinky Curly's Stellar Strands for deep conditioning if you want the conditioner to really, truly penetrate your hair. With Stellar Strands, your curls are defined before doing the LOC/LCO method, meaning the deep conditioner is not just sitting on top of your head like Heal & Renew.

Title: Super creamy but more stengthening type of mask
Review: I have heard and read rave reviews for this heal renew treatment . I feel it's more of a strengthening mask then moisture mask. It smells really nice , pleasent and not over powering like most . A little bit goes a long way , it's very very creamy which I love . I apply on soakinh wet hair it kind of sits on my hair so I have to use a heating cap . and then I also use a more moisturizing deep conditioner because this is not a moisture treatment and there isn't nuch slip tp detangle my 4c hair .

Title: Wow
Review: I have bleached curls. It takes a lot to keep them moisturized. I usually use AG's leave in which is AMAZING, but wanted to try something a little more on the natural side for the health of my hair. I was skeptical of this because it's spray and not cream form- and I REALLY need the moisture to last all week. This stuff, is amazing. My hair felt so soft. And I have been using it to refresh and my curls drink it up. It smells so lovely too. Highly recommend you try it- and even though this line carries a refresher (that I can't wait to try) you can use this product for both leave in and refresh. Not heavy AT ALL. I'm loving this line!

Title: HORRIBLE - DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Review: HORRIBLE – DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!After trying this product for about 1 week, my hair was so dry and brittle it was unbelievable.I contacted the Seller which is direct (Uncle Funky Monkey or something) and they pretty much said “Sorry cant help you “My recommendation, don’t buy from a Company that does not back their product, obviously they are NOT looking out for the best interest of their Customer!

Title: Nice smell and softness
Review: I like the smell,  texture of the mist, makes the curls  pop with the mist sprayed onto hair.  I like all the products from this line and will continue to use and buy more products from Uncle Funky's Daughter .

Title: Not the best smelling product.
Review: So far this product has been good with my hair. The only thing that is preventing me from giving it 5 stars is the smell. It's probably one of the worst smelling that I've ever used and I wasnt sure that I can keep with the smell. I will say though that the smell goes away after I add other products from this line. That being said, I will keep with the product because the smell goes away after other things have been added

Title: Does nothing- consistency it terrible
Review: A YouTube blogger said this was great....NOPE watery and overpriced- I had to return it!

Title: Just didnt measure up,,,,,
Review: I was expecting a lot more than I got. Just an average product that didnt deliver the results  I wanted. Too expensive to ship back so I'm stuck with it.

Title: My go to products!
Review: I get great results every time. Pairs great with the Curly Magic Curl Stimulator.

Title: Its okay
Review: Difficult to detangle hair after usage

Title: My Favorite
Review: I love this product. My hair is moisturize and soft when I use it.

Title: Not quite
Review: It’s OK but not quite what I’m looking for

Title: USE AT BEDTIME; HAIR LOOK GREAT IN MORNING
Review: USE AT BEDTIME; HAIR LOOK GREAT IN MORNING

Title: Moisture and More
Review: Awesome product for my natural curly hair

Title: I love it!
Review: My curls felt so lightweight & I had minimal frizz! All the other leave ins I use don’t tame ny frizz

Title: Awesome
Review: This product is great for retaining curl definition. I love it!

Title: If you have low porosity hair this product is for you
Review: I love this because it does de tangle

Title: Did not moisturize my hair
Review: Did not moisturize my hair. Made it feel very rough

Title: All of UFD products are the BEST!
Review: I just love uncle funky's daughter

Title: Best leave in conditioner for my type 4 hair
Review: Best leave in conditioner for my type 4 hair. I use it everyday to refresh & hydrate my curly hair. And the spray smells like blueberries. I highly recommend!

Title: I  love this product
Review: It is leave in conditioner with no build up

Title: Smells Yummy Too
Review: Smells like a little candy! Love it!

Title: Midnite train
Review: I like it and it smells awesome

Title: Great for my thirsty hair
Review: I use this everyday and love that I got the 8oz bottle because I am only able to purchase 6oz a target. So thanks

Title: Awesome on Natural Hair
Review: Awesome love this product on my natural hair

Title: Must have
Review: I love the scent and it worked really well

Title: Five Stars
Review: Love me some Uncle Funky's!

Title: Need improvement
Review: Makes my hair dry

Title: One Star
Review: My hair hates it!

Title: Great!
Review: I truly love this product it helped me combat dandruff.

Title: Five Stars
Review: LOVE it!

Title: Hair hated it instantly
Review: Usually when my hair does not like a product my hair will look nice for the first few days after styling but will start to get dry and be dryer than normal by the next wash day; with this product, I had an instantaneous dryness and brittleness that floored me. My hair was still wet and freshly deep conditioned when I applied this product to my hair and my hair became very brittle and tangled right away! I'm not sure if it was the protein in the product or what caused the bad reaction, but it went into the garbage right away.

Title: Curl Refresher not Leave-In
Review: Great product, but not for suggested use. I find the best way to use this product is as a refresher. As a leave-in it does not provide enough slip to detangle. But as a refresher, my curls look and feel so moisturized!

Title: I like it!!
Review: I really like it.  Use it after every workout.  It works great!

Title: Great Products but overpriced on Amazon
Review: It's better to order from UFD website.

Title: Not for Type 4 Hair
Review: I have 4 grade hair. This makes it brittle. It has a lot of perfume and alcohol in it. It's cool if you like your hair to smell good.

Title: Five Stars
Review: I love Midnight Train Conditioner. It keeps my 4c hair moist without build up

Title: Great product
Review: Very good

Title: Not for me
Review: Very sticky didn’t like at all

Title: It’s a YES for me!
Review: My curly salon uses their products and this right here along with their curl gel was the only product that defined my 4B hair!

Title: Great smell
Review: Smells amazing

Title: Not for soft manageable curls
Review: Very disappointed.  It created some sort of film on my hair.  It caused my soft curls to be dry and brittle after 1 use. Not again will I order this.  It's taken me weeks to get NY hair manageable again!

Title: Great product terrible delivery.
Review: The product works in my hair exactly as stated on the bottle.

Title: Very pleased ☺️
Review: This product is awesome it has a great smell it's not sticky and loosen up curles well

Title: Everyone’s hair is different. Try it yourself.
Review: I originally tried the sample kit and fell in love with the products. I was so tired of all the corporate drama with other hair companies. Midnight Train works amazing on my hair. I pair it with Curly Magic or Extra Butter. Don’t buy a full size to “try” and complain about it in the comments. I am so glad they had the samples sizes in a cute kit. I refill the sample sizes and take them with me when I travel. Give them a try. I don’t mix brands on my hair either. That may be some of the issues others are having.
